snippet: Paying for college can be one of a household’s most complex financial decisions. Here, we try to supply answers to four of the most important questions on rates and avoiding financial surprises.
abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column contends that figuring out how how to pay for college is often a household's most complex financial task; provides detailed advice on the four basic components of loan financing, and how to avoid the financial surprises it can entail.
lead_paragraph: Paying for college can be one of a household’s most complex financial decisions. Here, we try to supply answers to four of the most important questions on rates and avoiding financial surprises.
